about_the_game:
Something's In The Air Redux is a sequel to Date Ariane Remastered, but it is designed to be a stand alone game.

In part, a remastering of the original Something's In The Air (2013), but with a streamlined story and playable as either a straight male or gay female character each with slightly different content.

Also in part, a satire of the "harem" dating sim genre with surprising new content over and above the original surprising content.

The original Something's In The Air was the first Renpy based visual novel to be made with 3D renders. A pretty impressive feat considering that they now number in the thousands.

I made this "Redux" version partly because the "Remastered" Date Ariane demanded it, but being a remake of the first of a genre has some potential. It was never as popular as Date Ariane, so I didn't feel obligated to be true to the original, hence some old "sequel" related content got dropped, and satirical genre defying content was added. I also incorporated the third game of the series Rachel Meets Ariane and added it to the end to make one big game out of two.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is for adults only.  It contains full male and female nudity rendered in 3D but was not made with actual people. It does contain adult situations including some graphic sex both oral and vaginal between male to female and female to female, as well as group sex (threesome).

detailed_description:
Something's In The Air Redux is a sequel to Date Ariane Remastered, but it is designed to be a stand alone game.

In part, a remastering of the original Something's In The Air (2013), but with a streamlined story and playable as either a straight male or gay female character each with slightly different content.

Also in part, a satire of the "harem" dating sim genre with surprising new content over and above the original surprising content.

The original Something's In The Air was the first Renpy based visual novel to be made with 3D renders. A pretty impressive feat considering that they now number in the thousands.

I made this "Redux" version partly because the "Remastered" Date Ariane demanded it, but being a remake of the first of a genre has some potential. It was never as popular as Date Ariane, so I didn't feel obligated to be true to the original, hence some old "sequel" related content got dropped, and satirical genre defying content was added. I also incorporated the third game of the series Rachel Meets Ariane and added it to the end to make one big game out of two.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c 1280x720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10

short_description: A sequel to the popular Date Ariane Remastered, but also a stand alone remake of Something's In The Air 2013. The "redux" version allows players to play as a male or female for the first time. This is also a satire of the multi-ending "harem game" genre with surprising twists and turns.
